_header: Many a man blames his wife pardie
_description: Women will have their word — fourteen quatrains (aaab) including refrain, ‘In villa’ plus burden (b): ‘In villa In villa quid vidistis in villa’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
Many a man blame his wif pardeþat he is mor to blame þan
                    she…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…Hys her shal grow þorow his hoodIn
                    villa

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Many a man blamys his wyffe pardeYet she ys more to blame than
                    heTrow ye þat any suche ther beIn villa…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…Or ellys by god & by the rodeBe he never so wyld &
                    wodeHys here shall grow thorow his hodeIn
                    villaExplicit
